alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Kane (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 12:55AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central De Kalb and southern Kane Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1254 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hinckley, or 9 miles north of Sandwich, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aurora, Bartlett, St. Charles, West Chicago, Batavia, Geneva, Campton Hills, South Elgin, Montgomery, North Aurora, Sugar Grove, Elburn, Wayne, Valley View, Hinckley, Lily Lake, Big Rock and Kaneville. Including the following interstate... I-88 between mile markers 99 and 120. This includes... Aurora University, Fermilab, IL Math and Science Academy, Kane County Cougars Ballpark, and Waubonsee Community College. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
